channel.title: Combat System
channel.description:
Can anyone help me fix my combat system? Or just explain what I need to do.
So i'm trying to make my items more accurate and more damnage. But when I give it more attack bonuses it doesnt make it more accurate.
For E.X.
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/mhyafl.png[/img]
I've heard lot's of things about my source being bad but idk what other source to use. Can i just rip a combat system off another source? and if so please explain how!
Thanks, Keith

item.title: Combat System
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:3, topic:539611”]I would edit the combat formula better explained combatassistant class and modify / add the accuracy Your base should be PI or DSPK due it’s popularity for starters at java. I would recommend Hyperion. (:
Gl
Kind regards,
Sh0ck[/quote]

Why would he utilise Hyperion as a server if he’s not advanced enough to modify formulas for combat?

Read full topic

item.title: Combat System
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

combat formulas clearly aren’t being done properly

solution? fix them
don’t know java? find another base

item.title: Combat System
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“Deadly-Pkerz, post:1, topic:539611”]Can anyone help me fix my combat system? Or just explain what I need to do.

So i’m trying to make my items more accurate and more damnage. But when I give it more attack bonuses it doesnt make it more accurate.

For E.X.

I’ve heard lot’s of things about my source being bad but idk what other source to use. Can i just rip a combat system off another source? and if so please explain how!

Thanks, Keith[/quote]
I would edit the combat formula better explained combatassistant class and modify / add the accuracy Your base should be PI or DSPK due it’s popularity for starters at java. I would recommend Hyperion. (:
Gl
Kind regards,
Sh0ck

Read full topic

item.title: Combat System
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

There is no de-facto guide on ripping content. I doubt you have the knowledge required to be able to do this. You can either learn java or use another base.

Read full topic
